text: of corpus callosum - Albinism - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Cerebellar vermis hypoplasia - Chronic mucocutaneous candidiasis - Cleft palate - Cleft upper lip - Congenital cataract - Congenital onset - Congestive heart failure - Cutaneous anergy - Decreased number of CD4+ T cells - Decreased T cell activation - Dilated cardiomyopathy - Failure to thrive - Growth delay - Hypopigmentation of the fundus - IgG deficiency - Immunoglobulin IgG2 deficiency - Left ventricular hypertrophy - Low-set
